languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that ally gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g} в первый раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} применяет к союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, этот союзник получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Leader targets an ally with an ability for the first time in a round, that ally gains +<u>(Leader's WP bonus)</u> temporary wounds.
Whenever the Leader targets an ally with an ability for the first time in a round, that ally gains +<u>Leader's WP bonus</u> temporary wounds.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}офицер{/g} в первый раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} применяет к союзнику {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, этот союзник получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that ally gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Когда лидер в первый раз за раунд применяет способность, делая целью союзника, союзник получает +<u>бонус ВОЛ лидера</u> временного здоровья.
Когда лидер в первый раз за раунд применяет способность, делая целью союзника, союзник получает +<u>бонус ВОЛ лидера</u> временного здоровья.

Когда лидер в первый раз за {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g} применяет {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g}, делая целью союзника, союзник получает +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g}.

languages.text: 每一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}军官{/g}首次对盟友使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，该盟友会获得{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}点{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that ally gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，当领袖首次对盟友使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，该盟友会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于<u>领袖的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>。
每一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}中，当领袖首次对盟友使用{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}时，该盟友会获得{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}，等同于{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}oficial{/g} seleccione a un aliado como objetivo de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, ese aliado gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that ally gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el aliado seleccione a un aliado como objetivo de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, ese aliado gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

Cada vez que el líder seleccione a un aliado como objetivo de una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} por primera vez en un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}, ese aliado gana +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g}.

languages.text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Offizier{/g} einen Verbündeten zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} anvisiert, erhält dieser Verbündete +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that ally gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der Offizier einen Verbündeten zum ersten Mal in einer {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} anvisiert, erhält dieser Verbündete +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.

Immer wenn der Anführer einen Verbündeten zum ersten Mal in dieser {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} mit einer {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} anvisiert, erhält dieser Verbündete +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporäre Wunden{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois que l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}officier{/g} cible un allié avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, cet allié bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that ally gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le Leader cible un allié avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, cet allié bénéficie de +<u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}VOL{/g} du Leader</u> {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.

Lorsque le Leader cible un allié avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} pour la première fois au cours d'un {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, cet allié bénéficie de +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}オフィサー{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中に初めて{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で味方をターゲットにした時、その味方の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}される。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerLeaderGlossary}Officer{/g} targets an ally with an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} for the first time in a {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, that ally gains +{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus} {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}temporary wounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text: リーダーが{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中に初めて{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で味方をターゲットにした時、その味方の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}が+<u>リーダーの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}WP{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>される。
リーダーが{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}中に初めて{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}で味方をターゲットにした時、その味方の{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}が+{unit_stat|WarhammerWillpower|bonus}される。
